entry.title: HOUSE REPUBLICAN LEADER STATEMENT ON 2024 ELECTIONS
entry.summary: November 8. 2024 3:50 a.m. Oregon House Republican Leader Jeff Helfrich issued a statement Thursday night, following the 2024 election. Helfrich said, “The elections results send a clear message: voters want lawmakers who can work across the aisle while standing firm on fiscal issues. We look forward to partnering with our colleagues on both sides...

entry.title: Serving those who served
entry.summary: On Veterans Day our thoughts turn to those who served or continue to serve in our nation’s military. How we honor and care for these men and women says much about us as a society and as individuals.

entry.title: College-level courses at Roseburg High School build paths to success
entry.summary: Roseburg High School students understand the value of hard work. In the case of free, dual credit courses, students not only complete college-level work, they save money while preparing for high-wage, high-demand jobs.
